title: Former Trump Adviser Acquitted on Charges of Acting as Emirati Agent
description: Thomas J. Barrack Jr., a Los Angeles businessman and friend of the former president, had been accused of working on behalf of the oil-rich nation without disclosing it.
dc:creator: Rebecca Davis Oâ€™Brien
media:credit: Jefferson Siegel for The New York Times
media:description: Thomas J. Barrack Jr. was one of several associates of Mr. Trump to come under legal and ethical scrutiny for their dealings with foreign interests.
